name: tm30
effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Shadow Ball to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Teleport)

flavor_text.black-white: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target’s Sp. Def stat.
